name: Match, Marry, Kill
description:
Intro:

You are an officiator approving and rejecting couples from getting married. Read each of the candidates’ profiles to figure out if they are a perfect match for each other, then decide whether they should split up or get married and live happily ever af-- wait, did one of them just get murdered?! 

A quirky matchmaking game with environmental clues where you must decide on the correct character matches while avoiding matches that might get your characters in trouble! There are four special characters to discover! Correct decisions will earn you points, bad decisions might get people killed, and some decisions will have unforeseen consequences that will affect your game!

How to play:

  • You're presented with two candidate cards for a potential couple. 
  • Use the mouse to either bond them in matrimony [Click Approve] or cancel their pairing [Click Deny]. 
  • If you approve, they will move on. If you deny,  they will come back to you later with a different person. 
  • But some special characters will have special interactions depending on your decisions. Try to find them all!
  • You score points for each correct decision you make (approve or deny) but get minus points for wrong matches and deaths. 
  • The game ends when you run out of time or run out of candidate cards.

Requirements:

  • Windows
  • Mouse
  • Audio on!
